name: C# developer
description:
International software development company for restaurant business and services.

Project
Cash register system SyrveFront, part of restaurant automation system

The team develops SyrveFront cash register system - a multifunctional application, one of the key projects of the company. As well as developing the main functions of cash register, the team is working on improving SyrveFront API and integration with various types of equipment: printers, fiscal loggers, scales, card readers, payment terminals, etc.

Project details:

  • Development environment: Visual Studio, Resharper, C# (7.3).
  • USER INTERFACE: WPF (XAML).
  • Technologies used: WCF, ReactiveExtensions, LINQ, BLToolkit, log4net, T4, Razor.
  • Related tools: Git, Jira, Crucible, and Teamcity.
  • Communications using Microsoft Teams.
  • Multiple supported versions: developing, released, previously released.
  • All tasks are solved in separate branches, mandatory code review, manual and automated testing.
  • Scrum methodology work and planning (SAFe): big release every three months and additional two-week interim releases.


Responsibilities:

  • Participation in the development of the ERP system.
  • Refactoring and optimization.
  • Development of new company products.
  • Conducting expert code reviews.
  • Support of existing integrations with trade equipment.
  • New integrations: fiscalization, printers, scales, payment terminals.
  • Creation and revision of technical documentation.
  • Consulting third-party developers.


Requirements:

  • Higher technical education.
  • Experience: At least 3 years in commercial development using C#.
  • Mastery of .Net Framework 4.7 (at least 4).
  • Understanding of modern development methodologies (Agile, unit testing, continuous integration).
  • Experience of working with Git.
  • Ability to work in a team, Independence.


Big plus:

  • Work experience with POS equipment and peripherals.
  • Experience working with Razor Engine.
  • Mastery of technologies and tools: WPF, WCF, LINQ, WinForms.
  • Experience with MS SQL Server and PostgreSQL.
  • Experience in developing highly loaded fault-tolerant systems.
  • Knowledge of the principles of building user-friendly interfaces, ergonomics.


We offer:

  • Working with an international company.
  • Registration under the Labor Code of Armenia from the first day.
  • Ability to work both remotely and in the office if desired.
  • Flexible start of the working day until 11:00.
  • Gym access package.
  • Free English Courses with colleagues.
  • Health insurance.
